#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define F(i,n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
#define FE(i,n) for(int i=0;i<=n;i++)
#define FR(i,n) for(int i=n;i>0;i--)
#define FRE(i,n) for(int i=n;i>=0;i--)
#define LL long long 

int get()
{
	char c=getchar();
	int x=0,flag=0;
	while ((c<'0'||c>'9')&&c!='-') c=getchar();
	if (c=='-')
	{
		flag=1;
		c=getchar();
	}
	while (c>='0'&&c<='9')
	{
		x=x*10+c-'0';
		c=getchar();
	}
	return flag?(-x):x;
}

LL int getll()
{
	char c=getchar();
	LL int x=0;
	int flag=0;
	while ((c<'0'||c>'9')&&c!='-') c=getchar();
	if (c=='-')
	{
		flag=1;
		c=getchar();
	}
	while (c>='0'&&c<='9')
	{
		x=x*10+c-'0';
		c=getchar();
	}
	return flag?(-x):x;
}

LL power (LL b, LL p, LL mod)
{
	if (p==1)
		return b;
	else if (p==0)
		return 1;
	LL p1 = p,ans=1;
	if (p%2 == 0)
	{
		ans = power(b,p/2,mod)%mod;
		ans = (ans * ans)%mod;
	}
	else if (p%2 == 1)
	{
		ans = power (b,p/2,mod)%mod;
		ans = (((ans * ans) %mod) *b)%mod;
	}
	return ans;
}

LL num_fact_mod(LL n, LL p)
{
	if (p>n)
	{
		LL ans=1;
		for (LL i=n;i>1;i--)
			ans = (ans*i)%p;
		return ans;
	}
	LL ans = 1,num=n/p,rem=n%p;
	ans = power((p-1),num,p);
	for (LL j=1;j<=rem;j++)
		ans = (ans *j)%p;
	ans = (ans * (num_fact_mod(num,p)%p))%p;
	return ans;
}

int main()
{
	int T=get();
	while (T--)
	{
		LL n,p,out=1;
		n=getll();
		p=getll();
		printf("%lld\n",num_fact_mod(n,p));
	}
	return 0;
}
